description: This file implements an Angular service called ApiService that wraps Angular's HttpClient. It centralizes base URL management and error handling for API requests, providing methods for GET and POST requests with configurable headers. The class uses dependency injection and environment variables for flexibility.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Angular service that wraps HttpClient for API interactions with configurable base URL and centralized error handling.

methods.name: getBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the current API base URL configured in the environment settings.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified API path with optional headers, using the base URL, and handles errors.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified API path with provided body and optional headers, with error handling.

methods.name: describeError
methods.description: Generates a human-readable string describing the error, especially focusing on HttpErrorResponse instances.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Logs the error details to console and propagates the error using RxJS throwError.
